title: Generate VPP Performance Report
description: A VPP program manager needs a monthly performance and revenue report for a portfolio of residential batteries.

tasks.description: Aggregate performance data for all batteries in the VPP for the last month, including dispatch events and total MWh discharged.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles the total number of events and energy dispatched.

tasks.description: Calculate the total revenue generated from grid services (e.g., frequency response, capacity markets).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the total revenue figure.

tasks.description: Calculate the individual earnings for each customer based on their contribution and the program's revenue-sharing agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of payments due to each customer.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report with key performance indicators (KPIs) and financial results.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a structured PDF report.
